unnormalised: Lately, I've been increasingly worried about the air quality, especially here in Delhi. It feels like every winter, we're back to square one, choking on smog. Remember that time around Diwali on 14/11/2020? The AQI was insane!

I remember reading about the Odd-Even scheme in Delhi, which supposedly reduced traffic and, thus, pollution. Did it actually work?
